You know what I don't get about you people is why you're so polarized.  Can't it be both?  ... I mean- couldn't 19 arabs have flown hijacked planes into the WTC towers AND the government covered up SOMETHING; whether or not they were directly responsible for whatever that something was.

I think a lotta folks get turned off by the "the government did it" people.  Personally I think that's a silly theory anyhow.  

So what do I think is going on?  *shrugs*  I dunno.  All I know is no one's proven one way or the other why those towers fell how they did.  It's inconclusive because there's a point and counter point for every detail that sounds good- but none of the physical evidence is left.  Just grainy videos to analyze.

Same thing with that plane which went down over pennsylvania.  Somehow debris; including pieces of metal- were spread over a several mile area.  All signs point to the plane coming apart in mid air from SOMETHING.  But there's no evidence.

We'll never know what happened.  And I think I'm ok with that.  Life goes on.

P.S.  This is without a doubt though- the best 9/11 skeptic video I have yet to see.  Saw it on google video a while back- doesn't get the attention it deserves...  It has to walk in the shadow of that awful loose change nonsense.
